Posts.Content: Apr 29, 2017 05:54AM - edited Apr 29, 2017 05:55AM by erinr28 I only had one breast removed because there was no cancer in the other breast; also before surgery the Oncogist, Radiologist and Surgeon meet with tumor board and they decide what they should do. I had the BRC1 and BRC2 tsted and it came back negative. I did not want reconstruction on the breast removed because I don't want anything fake and you constantly have to get them checked and new implants every so often and they can hide any new cancer that may come back.
